column34:
Amber Heard and Eve Barlow have launched an attack against anyone who shares the truth about the current Fairfax trial.  By truth, I am referring to irrefutable evidence that Amber Heard is lying in her testimony against Johnny Depp. This can be seen in hours of past testimony, depositions, as well as photographs and public audio that show the stories of her and her co-conspirators do not match up.  This vindictive plot has gone too far, but now it’s gone even further as her following are encouraging acts of domestic social terrorism against private citizens exercising their rights to share their truth.  
FBI.gov defines domestic terrorism as “Violent, criminal acts committed by individuals and/or groups to further ideological goals stemming from domestic influences, such as those of a political, religious, social, racial, or environmental nature.”

As social terrorists, Amber Heard followers who call themselves “Shooters for Amber 2.0” have filed false police reports, publicly listed the names of independent journalists who disagree with them, and provoked their following to attack the aforementioned individuals. 
Those such as “thatumbrellaguy” and “thatBrianfella” have been targeted by threats to their individual liberties such as the first amendment right to express yourself openly on a public platform, by Amber Heard followers who are calling law enforcement to report false accusations. 
In recently obtained posts from their private chat, they are looking for ways to threaten an anonymous YouTuber by sharing their private information and encouraging Amber Heard fans to harass them. This seems to depend upon what Amber’s team decides to do with the information. Members of Shooters 2.0 suggest shooting Depp fans at the trial with paintball guns as well as falsely flagging and reporting Depp fans and YouTubers accounts that they dislike. 
The goal of this petition is to have the social abuse of private individuals by Amber Heard and Eve Barlow as well as their following “Shooters for Amber Heard 2.0” and as default 1.0 included in the list of domestic terrorist organizations. 
Reason being that, the goal of this terrorist group is to illegally and publicly interfere with the first amendment rights of independent journalists.  Such terrorism should be prohibited on US soil and those who are a part of this terrorist group and have committed such illegal acts as “filing false police reports” should be brought to Justice. 
At the very least, the act of intimidating and preventing another US Citizen from exercising their rights, in the name of the “Shooters for Amber 2.0” cause should be labeled as an act of domestic terrorism against private local independent journalists.

column34:
Amber Heard and Eve Barlow have launched an attack against anyone who shares the truth about the current Fairfax trial.  By truth, I am referring to irrefutable evidence that Amber Heard is lying in her testimony against Johnny Depp. This can be seen in hours of past testimony, depositions, as well as photographs and public audio that show the stories of her and her co-conspirators do not match up.  This vindictive plot has gone too far, but now it’s gone even further as her following are encouraging acts of domestic social terrorism against private citizens exercising their rights to share their truth.  
FBI.gov defines domestic terrorism as “Violent, criminal acts committed by individuals and/or groups to further ideological goals stemming from domestic influences, such as those of a political, religious, social, racial, or environmental nature.”

As social terrorists, Amber Heard followers who call themselves “Shooters for Amber 2.0” have filed false police reports, publicly listed the names of independent journalists who disagree with them, and provoked their following to attack the aforementioned individuals. 
Those such as “thatumbrellaguy” and “thatBrianfella” have been targeted by threats to their individual liberties such as the first amendment right to express yourself openly on a public platform, by Amber Heard followers who are calling law enforcement to report false accusations. 
In recently obtained posts from their private chat, they are looking for ways to threaten an anonymous YouTuber by sharing their private information and encouraging Amber Heard fans to harass them. This seems to depend upon what Amber’s team decides to do with the information. Members of Shooters 2.0 suggest shooting Depp fans at the trial with paintball guns as well as falsely flagging and reporting Depp fans and YouTubers accounts that they dislike. 
The goal of this petition is to have the social abuse of private individuals by Amber Heard and Eve Barlow as well as their following “Shooters for Amber Heard 2.0” and as default 1.0 included in the list of domestic terrorist organizations. 
Reason being that, the goal of this terrorist group is to illegally and publicly interfere with the first amendment rights of independent journalists.  Such terrorism should be prohibited on US soil and those who are a part of this terrorist group and have committed such illegal acts as “filing false police reports” should be brought to Justice. 
At the very least, the act of intimidating and preventing another US Citizen from exercising their rights, in the name of the “Shooters for Amber 2.0” cause should be labeled as an act of domestic terrorism against private local independent journalists.
